column4: Hi folks, is there anyway to check what version a package is in apt before installing it?
Does anybody use screen and ever notice it behaving strangely with gnome-terminal? Screens blacking out, typing over the status bar and generally being a pain in the ass? :/
Try using tty instead of gnome-terminal. Ctrl+Alt+F1
I'm sure it may work pretty good, I just wondered if there was a workaround for gnome-terminal, I enjoy using it with x
